CustomerProfile.title: CustomerProfile
CustomerProfile.description: Represents a user of the banking application, storing their personal and contact information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CustomerProfile entity.

username.description: The chosen username for the client.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the user's profile image.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

email.description: The primary email address of the customer.

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number of the customer.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the customer's street address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the customer's street address, if applicable.

city.description: The city of the customer's address.

state.description: The state or province of the customer's address.

postalCode.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the customer's address.

country.description: The country of the customer's address.

signature.description: Digital text representation of the user's legal signature.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the customer profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the customer profile was last updated.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Represents a bank account held by a customer, such as checking, savings, or credit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Account entity.

customerId.description: Reference to the CustomerProfile that owns this account.

accountNumber.description: The unique account number for this bank account.

currency.description: The currency of the account balance.

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

accountName.description: A user-friendly name or nickname for the account.

status.description: The current status of the account.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the account was last updated.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a financial transaction associated with a bank account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Transaction entity.

accountId.description: Reference to the Account involved in this transaction.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the transaction.

currency.description: The currency of the transaction amount.

description.description: A brief description of the transaction.

transactionDate.description: The date and time when the transaction occurred.

status.description: The current status of the transaction.

referenceNumber.description: A unique reference number for the transaction.

Payee.title: Payee
Payee.description: Represents an external recipient of funds.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Payee entity.

customerId.description: Reference to the CustomerProfile who has added this payee.

payeeName.description: The official name of the payee or organization.

nickname.description: A user-defined friendly name for the payee.

definition.description: Stores the profile information for a specific customer.
Stores bank accounts owned by a specific customer.
